name: Dream Land
description:
This is a pixel sandbox RPG.Its characteristics are challenging fights, cooking, and free character development.

Enemies


Over one hundred types of animals, plants, or monsters,with their own characteristics and combat patterns. Fight them to obtain resources or learn skills.

Combat


No easy fight in this game. Craft equipments,develop attributes,unlock combat skills,and fight wisely.Four combat styles can be chosen with customizable skills sets.

Crafting


Build bases, craft equipments, items and magic charms.Over one thousand items, most of which can be crafted.

Food system


Collect resources, unlock recipes, and plan the cooking/eating reasonably to increase attributes.Hundreds of food recipes for cooking.

Exploring the World


100+ scenes in game, where players can freely come and go,and freely build their own bases.

Main Plot


The game has some storylines, after completing the main storyline and defeating the final boss, the game will end. But you can choose to complete the game, or just do free sandbox playing. Currently, the approximate time to complete game is over 60 hours.
